known_issues: Mobile phone compatibility issues - app not working on mobile devices
Version 202 tested on mobile - nothing is working (complete functionality failure)
Scrolling not working on mobile devices (Version 203)

existing_features.title: Diagnose and fix mobile phone compatibility issues preventing the app from working on mobile devices
Fix mobile responsive layout issues in Header component, ensuring the mobile menu toggles correctly and navigation links are accessible
Fix viewport meta tag configuration and ensure proper mobile scaling in index.html

Investigate and fix critical JavaScript errors preventing the entire application from loading or functioning on mobile devices by examining browser console logs, service worker registration, and main bundle loading

Verify and fix touch event handlers across all interactive elements including buttons, cards, navigation links, video controls, and dialog overlays to ensure they respond properly to mobile touch inputs
Fix mobile viewport rendering issues including proper scaling, scroll behavior, and layout overflow that may be preventing content from displaying correctly on mobile screens
Test and fix service worker caching strategy on mobile browsers to ensure proper asset loading, offline functionality, and cache updates without blocking app initialization

Diagnose and fix scrolling issues on mobile devices by examining CSS overflow properties, touch-action directives, viewport height calculations, and scroll event handlers across all scrollable containers including main content areas, dialogs, and sidebar navigation

Perform comprehensive mobile compatibility verification testing across all major features to ensure the application functions correctly on mobile devices, including navigation, authentication, video playback, form submission, and interactive elements

new_feature_requests.summary: Verify and fix touch event handling across all interactive components (buttons, cards, sliders, dialogs) to ensure proper mobile interaction
Test and fix service worker functionality on mobile devices to ensure proper caching and offline capabilities
Verify Internet Identity authentication flow works correctly on mobile browsers, including redirect handling
Fix Internet Identity authentication flow for mobile browsers, ensuring the redirect URL handling works correctly and users can complete login on mobile devices
Add comprehensive mobile device debugging capability including error logging, network request monitoring, and device information display to identify root causes of mobile failures
Fix scrolling functionality on mobile devices
